data.title: KISS ME GOODBYE!
data.text:
Song Information

Artist: TAEKO

Composition/Arrangement/Guitars/Bass/Other Instruments & Programming: Jimmy Weckl

Lyrics: Thomas Howard Lichtenstein

Vocals: TAEKO

Tambourine: Hirofumi Sasaki

BPM: 120

Length: 1:37

Movie: もっちー

First Music Game Appearance: GUITARFREAKS 8thMIX & drummania 7thMIX

Other Music Game Appearances:

GuitarFreaksXG & DrumManiaXG

Lyrics

Every day, every night, every moment is a fight Here in this land of concrete where I try to make my home I can scratch, I can bite,'til I lose my appetite For everything inside this urban danger zone Kiss me goodbye Cause I'm going where the clouds are floating in the sky Kiss me goodbye I'll be there with the wind in my hair Not a care anywhere Kiss me goodbye I will go where the grasses can grow Where all of god's creation Fills me with elation I can feel my body start to glow Kiss me goodbye I'm like an eagle .......Fly! No more aggravation Only relaxation I'm in love with life... Kiss me goodbye

Song Connections / Remixes

None.

Trivia

This song has different backgrounds, banners, jackets, or other related images. For more information, please see this page.

KISS ME GOODBYE! is the first song composed by Jimmy Weckl with TAEKO as the vocalist.

KISS ME GOODBYE! is available in GUITARFREAKS 11thMIX & drummania 10thMIX with an e-AMUSEMENT account.

KISS ME GOODBYE! has been made automatically available in Standard mode as of GuitarFreaks V & DrumMania V.

KISS ME GOODBYE! is available in GuitarFreaksXG & DrumManiaXG as an unlockable song in JukeBox #3 (September 29th, 2010).

As of November 26th, 2010, it has been automatically unlocked into Standard Mode.

Song Production Information

Untranslated.

Video Production Information

Untranslated.

Difficulty & Notecounts

GF/DM difficulty rated from 1 to 99.

GF/DM XG and GITADORA difficulty rated from 0.00 to 9.99. (Ratings and notecounts obtained from BEMANIWiki 2nd and GITADORA Rating Sources.)
